column4: whats the mail server of yahoo mail. i'm trying to configure my thunderbird
you need the webmail and yahoo extensions.
theres no max,min,close button on my title bar, no icons on my menus, my typing behavior changed like i have to repeatedly press the backspace to move back.
sounds like your xorg is messed up. Although not sure about the keybindings thing...
is there a way to fix that? can you help me with it
not sure... what did you do prior to it breaking?
did a sudo apt-get --purge remove compiz* libcompizconfig
sounds like some dependencies got screwed. Try "apt-get install --reinstall metacity"
try restarting X (ctrl-alt-backspace). Then sign on to irc again, and tell us what happened.
i'm on my emerald theme currently
oh! thats probs it - if you've removed all the compiz stuff, the emerald theme won't render properly.
no... compiz and emerald are working fine now.. but the metacity is not
hmm... try asking in the #ubuntu-effects channel. or
